content: I cannot recommend specific brands or products. it is best to consult with a healthcare professional to determine the appropriate dose and quality of supplements for your individual needs. in general, the recommended daily dose of magnesium is around 400-420mg for men and 310-320mg for women. for riboflavin, the recommended daily dose is around 1.1mg for women and 1.3mg for men. however, this may vary depending on your individual needs and the severity of your migraines. it is important to follow the dosage instructions on the supplement packaging and consult with a healthcare professional before starting any new supplement regimen.
